summary: This is an email chain from February 2019 between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing the need for and location of an FBI Form 302 (interview report) related to an individual named 'Pecker'. The chain shows follow-ups from December 2018 regarding the document.

persons.name: Pecker
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the FBI Form 302 (interview report) being discussed and requested by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Initial search for Pecker 302
events.description: An email was sent from the U.S. Attorney's Office requesting all 'Pecker 302s' as they could not be found in their files. Follow-up emails indicate a proffer and notes were discussed.

events.title: Follow-up request for Pecker 302
events.description: A follow-up email stresses the need for 'Pecker's 302 for our file', and an attached PDF of the 302 is subsequently provided.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain concerning an FBI Form 302 related to an individual named 'Pecker'.
The correspondence is between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The initial request for the document dates to December 2018, with a follow-up in February 2019 emphasizing its need.
The 'Pecker 302' document was finalized and attached to an email on February 8, 2019.
The email signatures indicate the involvement of an Assistant United States Attorney.
